description: React component for a checkout page handling user details, coupons, payment simulation, order creation in Supabase, and navigation.

methods.name: applyCoupon
methods.description: Handles applying coupon codes and setting coupon state.

methods.name: validateBeforePay
methods.description: Validates user input and cart state before proceeding with payment.

methods.name: simulatePayment
methods.description: Simulates payment processing, returns success after a timeout.

methods.name: handleConfirmPayment
methods.description: Processes payment, creates order and related records in Supabase, clears cart, and navigates on success.
